en.bulletin-title: Thank You for Choosing AOSC OS
en.bulletin-body: AOSC OS strives to simplify your user experience and improve your day-to-day productivity.

en.desktop+latx-description: A full-featured desktop experience (with Loongson Architecture Translator for x86).
en.desktop+nvidia-description: A full-featured desktop experience (with proprietary NVIDIA driver).
en.base-description: A minimal system with a basic set of utilities.
en.server-description: A full-featured system for personal servers.
en.retro-desktop-description: A full-featured desktop experience (for legacy devices).
en.retro-base-description: A minimal system with a basic set of utilities (for legacy devices).
en.retro-server-description: A full-featured system for personal servers (for legacy devices).
en.retro-buildkit-description: A standardized development environment (for legacy devices).
